annotation.summary: Suggestion is a 4th-level spell that implants a compelling idea into a creature’s mind, urging it to follow a reasonable course of action that isn’t self-destructive. The target resists with a Will save, and the spell’s duration and effect depend on the result.

key_rules.duration: varies (1 minute to 1 hour depending on result)

save_results.critical_success: Target unaffected and aware of the attempt.
save_results.failure: Target follows the suggestion for 1 minute or until the task ends or becomes self-destructive.
save_results.critical_failure: As failure, but duration increases to 1 hour.

annotation.prerequisites: Ability to cast 4th-level arcane or occult spells.

annotation.summary: Summon Animal is a 1st-level spell that calls forth an animal ally to fight for the caster for up to 1 minute, requiring sustained concentration.
key_rules: Summons a creature with the animal trait of level –1.
Requires three actions to cast.
Duration is sustained up to 1 minute.
Heightened effects follow the summon trait rules.
annotation.action_economy: Three actions to cast; sustaining the spell requires one action each round.
annotation.prerequisites: Ability to cast 1st-level arcane or primal spells.

annotation.summary: Summons a celestial creature of level 5 or lower to fight for the caster, sustained through concentration for up to one minute. The summoned being acts on the caster’s behalf, and deity restrictions may apply.
key_rules: Summons a celestial creature with level ≤ 5
Duration sustained up to 1 minute
Range 30 feet
Subject to deity restrictions on summonable celestials
Heightened effects follow the summon trait rules

annotation.summary: Summon Construct is a 1st-level spell that calls forth a construct creature to fight for the caster for up to one minute, requiring sustained concentration.
annotation.key_rules: The spell summons a construct creature of level –1. The creature acts on the caster’s turn and follows the caster’s commands. The spell duration lasts as long as it is sustained, up to one minute. Heightened versions follow the general summon trait rules.
annotation.action_economy: Three actions to cast; sustaining the spell each round requires one action.
annotation.prerequisites: Ability to cast arcane spells and access to the Summon Construct spell.
annotation.query: Summon Construct spell details and mechanics

annotation.summary: Summon Dragon is a 5th-level summoning spell that calls forth a dragon of level 5 or lower to fight on the caster’s behalf for up to 1 minute, sustained through concentration.
key_rules: Summons a dragon creature of level 5 or lower.
The summoned dragon acts on your turn and follows your commands.
If the dragon has a magical tradition trait, you can only summon it using that same tradition.
Duration is sustained up to 1 minute.
Heightened effects follow the general summon trait rules.
annotation.action_economy: Three actions to cast; sustaining the spell requires one action each round.
annotation.prerequisites: Ability to cast 5th-level spells and access to the arcane, divine, occult, or primal tradition.

annotation.summary: Summon Elemental is a 2nd-level spell that calls forth a low-level elemental creature to fight on the caster’s behalf for up to 1 minute, sustained through concentration.
annotation.key_rules: You can summon an elemental creature of level 1 or lower within 30 feet. The spell lasts as long as you sustain it, up to 1 minute. Heightening follows the general summon trait rules.
annotation.action_economy: Three actions to cast; requires sustaining each round to maintain.
annotation.prerequisites: Ability to cast 2nd-level arcane or primal spells.
annotation.query: Summon Elemental spell details and mechanics

annotation.summary: A 5th-level spell that summons an aberration of level 5 or lower to fight for the caster, lasting up to 1 minute with sustained concentration.
key_rules: Summons an aberration creature of level 5 or lower.
Creature acts on the caster’s turn and follows their commands.
Duration is sustained up to 1 minute.
Heightened effects follow the general summon trait rules.
annotation.action_economy: Three actions to cast; requires sustaining each round to maintain.

annotation.summary: Summon Fey is a 1st-level spell that calls forth a fey creature to fight for the caster for up to 1 minute, sustained through concentration.
annotation.key_rules: The summoned creature must have the fey trait and a level equal to the spell level minus one. The spell follows the general summon rules for duration, control, and heightened effects.
annotation.action_economy: Three actions to cast; sustaining the spell requires one action each round.
annotation.prerequisites: Access to the occult or primal tradition and the ability to cast 1st-level spells.

annotation.summary: Summon Fiend is a 5th-level divine spell that calls forth a fiendish creature of level 5 or lower to fight for the caster. The summoned creature remains for up to 1 minute as long as the spell is sustained. The type of fiend available may depend on the caster’s deity.
key_rules: Summons a creature with the fiend trait of level 5 or lower.
The summoned creature acts on the caster’s turn and follows the caster’s commands.
The GM may restrict which fiends can be summoned based on deity alignment or domain.
Duration is sustained up to 1 minute.
Heightened effects follow the general summon trait rules.
annotation.action_economy: Three actions to cast; sustaining the spell requires one action each round.
annotation.query: Summon Fiend spell details and mechanics

annotation.summary: Summon Giant is a 5th-level primal spell that calls forth a giant of level 5 or lower to fight for the caster. The summoned creature remains for up to 1 minute as long as the caster sustains the spell.
key_rules: Summons a creature with the giant trait of level 5 or lower.
Requires concentration and manipulation components.
Duration is sustained up to 1 minute.
Heightened effects follow the general summon trait rules.
annotation.action_economy: Three actions to cast; sustaining the spell requires one action each round.
annotation.prerequisites: Caster must have access to the primal tradition and be able to cast 5th-level spells.
annotation.query: Summon Giant spell details and mechanics
